entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Client certs with HttpClient on Windows prevents X509Certificate2 cleanup #101090
  • [API Proposal]: Add BinaryPrimitives Single and Double support to .NET standard 2.1 #101085
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named `DOTNET_GCPath` #101080
  • ConfigurationBindingGenerator should move to GetInterceptableLocation API #101079
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] net7.0 debugger tests timing out. #101075
    Future
  • [Mono] App crashes with BadImageFormatException: Method has no body #101074
    9.0.0
  • System.Tests.DateTimeTests.ParseExact_Span_ValidInput_Succeeds #101072
    9.0.0
  • NullabilityInfoContext returns incorrect results for an indexer parameter if the class has a property with a value type return type. #101071
  • SPMI for Arm64 failing asserting for `argReg == argNode->GetRegNum()` #101070
  • Wrong time zones México, System.TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById #101069
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294/DevDiv_255294.cmd Linux x64 #101065
  • dotnet tool install can return an incorrect error message #101064
  • [System.Convert]::FromBase64String causes memory leak with large strings #101061
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #101060
    9.0.0
  • NTLM authentication not working in Linux based environment #101058
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT Fails On Windows For Paths With a Space #101055
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Support fingers-crossed mode for logging. #101054
  • ilasm do not handle the "/mdv" command line option #101052
  • unix/windows commands are mixed in helix run script #101050
  • Sigsegv in dotnet/msbuild when building repo #101049
  • JIT: Small primitives on arm32/apple arm64 ABI need explicit normalization to 32 bits #101046
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Failed to create generic virtual method implementation #101043
  • XML Serializer does not work correctly in "net8.0-ios" release mode #101041
  • [API Proposal]: Add sendmmsg and recvmmsg to Socket for Linux #101036
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.CompilerServices.UnsafeTests.BitCast #101034
    9.0.0

Closed

  • C99 "snprintf" instead of _snprintf all over the place for GCC, Clang and VCR 2015 #4278
    Future
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x8007000C #96247
  • Cannot build docker app after upgrade to .NET 8 (with blazor) #95477
    9.0.0
  • ProvisionEmscripten task fails with [SSL: CERTIFICATE_VERIFY_FAILED] when acquiring Node. #101081
  • Process Start with RedirectOutput can lead to thread starvation #101067
  • [RISC-V] Optimizing assemblies for size failed #96978
  • [API Proposal]: params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads for existing params T[] overloads #77873
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 2/19/2024 10:53:50 AM #99006
  • [API Proposal]: Replace `TFrom : struct` constraint on `Unsafe.BitCast` with a dynamic check #99205
    9.0.0
  • arm64: ror+eor -> eor, ror #101027
    9.0.0
  • JsonNode property names are not renamed according to JsonNamingPolicy #101068
  • System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_MaxResponseHeadersLength_Http3.SetAfterUse_Throws has failed #101063
  • JIT: use reverse post-order (RPO) traversal for morph #93246
    9.0.0
  • Need a better user experience for crash dumps occurring in PRs #31820
    Future
  • Trimmer removes `InternalsVisibleTo` attributes for assemblies which are trimmed #92582
  • SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo throws an exception if compared to null #100990
  • Cannot install wasi-experimental: Not found in NuGet feeds #100666
  • Segmentation fault in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #93206
    9.0.0
  • Dotnet native compiled js file referencing wrong function in blazor web assembly file #100591
    8.0.x
  • SegFault while trying to Copy native test components in monointerpreter test run build #67405
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Investigate RAM consumption in Mono AOT compiler #95791
    9.0.0
  • ILC crashes on x64, works on arm64 #99611
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Do not allow blocking on the thread with JS interop: UI, JSWebWorker #76958
    9.0.0
  • [browser][webSocket] Data Loss in ClientWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #96359
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Channel.CreateUnboundedPrioritized #62761
    9.0.0
  • Blazor WASM: Blazor.start() promise does not resolve on certain errors #95970
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] asynch dispatch soundness #98309
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Runtime tests' build gets terminated with `exited with code 137` #94077
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] Unhandled JS error #97546
    9.0.0
  • mono_jit_compile_method_jit_only failed #100237
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Unable to evaluate script: tab crashed #100275
    9.0.0
  • [browser][AOT] CollectionsMarshalTests.GetValueRefOrNullRefClass #100409
  • `Buffer.Memmove` has unaligned casts #83709
    Future
  • Using Visual Studio for Managed Code #101035

PullRequests

Created

  • Create ReadOnlySpan marshaller for ManagedToUnmanagedOut scenarios #101095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [PERF][Release/8.0] Update queues. #101094
    area-Infrastructure
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #101093
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/7.0-staging into release/7.0 #101092
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #101091
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Upgrade GCLogParser to NetCoreAppToolCurrent #101089
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add some basic guidelines around using C++ standard headers now that our build allows us to #101088
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Add option to keep/remove COM interfaces #101087
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix ilasm /mdv option #101086
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Build CoreLib as AnyCPU #101084
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Globbing - Use GetFullPath for normalization on relative files #101083
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 9.0.0
  • [mono] simdhash tweaks #101082
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] fix .Wait in CompleteTask #101078
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix helix os detection #101077
    area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Set `out` parameters to default instead of using SkipInit in Interop generators #101076
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Update EOL versions in release/8.0-staging #101073
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: Model JIT helper exceptions correctly in VN #101062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] dont trim fail fast message #101056
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Ensure Array.CreateInstance for reference types works #101048
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Ignore] Wondering if this is reachable #101040
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Ignore strongname mismatch for assemblies returned by AssemblyResolve event #101039
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Insert a breakpoint instruction after throwing calls #101037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0] Bump NugetPackagingVersion to 6.2.4 #101033
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #100372
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0-staging] Always zero-init if object contains pointers #100426
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [6.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99582
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.30
  • [8.0] Reset OOB packages enabled in the April release #99583
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.5
  • Add metadata for workload automation #100648
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • Drop generic type constraints from Unsafe.BitCast #100842
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Update Architecture to unknown machine #101038
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add params ReadOnlySpan<T> overloads #100898
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.8] Add metadata for workload automation #100649
    Servicing-approved, area-Workloads
  • [Release/8.0] Remove preventing EH at shutdown #100836
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [release/8.0-staging] Guard against -1 Returned from sysconf for the Cache Sizes Causing Large Gen0 Sizes and Budgets for Certain Linux Distributions. #100575
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.5
  • [browser][MT] JSImport with DiscardNoWait is OK in the middle of pending synchronous call #101044
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][eventpipe] Fix firing dynamic method wrappers crash #99712
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.5
  • [browser] tests for more unicode characters #101059
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add support for containing RotateLeft/RotateRight on Arm64 #101030
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update SDK to preview 3 release #100945
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • Provide System.Windows.Extensions package readme #99665
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Fix ArgumentNullException in SecurityIdentifier.CompareTo(null) #101002
    area-System.Security
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Activator.CreateInstance for shared generic structs #101021
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100818
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Enable MonoEnableAssertMessages on test CI #101045
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Fix Cannot redefine property: stack #101042
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fixed printing jump destinations in disassembler on release #100967
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add Channel.CreateUnboundedPrioritized #100550
    area-System.Threading.Channels, 9.0.0
  • [mono][android] Disable Linux Bionic [x64/arm64] libraries test runs due to failures #100980
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution

Updated

  • Vectorized `GetNonRandomizedHashCode` #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Weak interior handles #100446
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't ignore the case when dataflow doesn't know what's going on #101031
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Return type from exact method context for call returns #100041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #99555
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [cdac] Implement a JSON contract reader #100966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 123.0.6312.122, windows: 123.0.6312.122 #101017
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • Update Mariner 2.0 to Azure Linux 3.0 #100942
    area-Infrastructure
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Fix typo in extractor.cpp #98940
    area-Single-File, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #100984
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, area-codeflow
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cdac] Make DAC load and use cDAC when available #100946
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasi] Debug missing wasmtime #100664
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Move profile checking back until just before inlining #101011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI Test #100951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [browser] load core assemblies first #100141
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Avoid loading ICU data early during mono startup #100587
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix mismatch between boxed/unboxed method entrypoints #99443
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser

    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Do not force sections for 'ordinary' data #2547
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge apr 24 #2543
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet format] CSharpFormattingCodeFixProvider and CSharpRemoveUnnecessaryImportsCodeFixProvider code fixes fail with .NET 9 preview 3 #40174
  • [NETSDKE2E]The winforms application which is generated by self-contained publish cannot run successfully. #40173
  • dotnet watch run (--) --no-restore tries to restore NuGet packages #40172

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wip] Pass RestoreActionConfig into ToolPackageDownloader to pass in restore action options #40185
    Area-Tools

Merged

  • Fix PR builds ran manually or against release branches #40186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #38045
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.3
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them #38048
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Identify loongarch64 as valid arch #40169
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Containers 8.0.3xx Package Release Notes #39942
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update warning message for containers package detection when building SDK-containerizable project types #39956
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Manual backport of #37832 servicing fix #38047
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Exponentiation operator #2585
    Any Time
  • Proposal: Type aliases / abbreviations / newtype #410

PullRequests

Created

  • Take "non-enumerable collection types" out of C# 12 #8055

Merged

  • Update README.md #8054

Updated

  • Initial overview of unions #7967

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • VB.NET compiler erroneously reports error BC30439 when converting certain large Double values to Long #73032
  • Intellisense does not work after updating to 17.10.0 Preview 3.0 #73023
  • NullReferenceException in MethodSymbol.get_ParameterCount() #73022

Closed

  • Add public API to obtain a location specifier for a call #72133
    17.11
  • Clarify Interceptors documentation #69140
    17.11
  • Add "make anonymous function static" code fix #45832
    Backlog
  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync fails with the new slnx files #73004
  • Code cleanup fixer "Remove unnecessary imports or usings" breaks code inside #if directives #73027
  • Add ability to exclude certain files and folders from analysis without marking them as GENERATED #72736
  • Calling MSBuildWorkspace.Create() throw exception System.MissingMethodException:“Method not found: 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableArray`1<System.Reflection.Assembly> #72666
  • CA2000 Use recommended dispose pattern to ensure that object created #73021
  • Unable to sort `global using` directives using type aliases #67768
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix flaky lsp mutating request tests #73036
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't load copilot assemblies if user's not logged in #73035
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not report exception message in fault details #73034
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix issue in editor config filepath comparison #73033
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Migrate 'Milestone tracking' to GitHub Actions #73031
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move off of ForegroundThreadAffinitizedObject #73029
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Specially handle some scenarios for type parameters with 'allows ref struct' constraint #73025
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • WIP: Add initial API shape #73024
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Move type into its own file #73028
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #73030
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report diagnostic when lambda binding count exceeds threshold #72823
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Moving to a streaming model for piping assets from the host to the server. #73013
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add Hot Reload brokered service registration #72989
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix crash in AIOSP when filtering down to projects #73026
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add 'Make anonymous function static' feature #73012
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72987
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused cancellation tokens from api #73020
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support intercepting invocation within conditional access #72998
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Partial properties 1 #72999
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix Double-to-Long overflow check #73016
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72947
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for `yield return` in `lock` #72755
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runtime and EF Core dependencies out of date #55153
  • RequestDelegateGenerator should move to GetInterceptableLocation API #55152
    9.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #55151
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55150
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #55149
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, updates #55148
  • NTLM authentication not working in Linux based environment #55146
  • provide ASPNETCORE_Kestrel__Certificates__Default__Password_File for docker #55144
  • Allow customization of Identity Api Routes #55142
  • AddQuickGridEntityFrameworkAdapter is missing from API docs #55136
  • Blazor WebApp template is not working as described #55133
  • Fix for: There was no runtime pack for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App available for the specified RuntimeIdentifier 'browser-wasm'. #55132
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #55130
  • how intercept the enhanced navigation calls and show & hide a loader for anhanced navigation #55128
  • Enhanced Load does not reopen broken socket connection #55127

Closed

  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #55124
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #55111
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #55115
  • Perf regression: json #55131
  • Quarantine MouseOverAndMouseOut_CanTrigger #53724
    9.0-preview4
  • Quarantine CanRenderLargeComponentsWithServerRenderMode #49975
    9.0-preview4
  • Quarantine CanUseFocusExtensionToFocusElementPreventScroll #46835
    9.0-preview4
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #55122
  • Setting Microsoft-related logs messages to "Information" or lower in appsetting.json causing an ASP.NET web application to stop serving page. Kestrel Web Server #54964

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement minimal implementation of HybridCache #55147
    area-networking
  • Enable building native projects for windows arm64 #55145
    area-infrastructure
  • #46810 #55143
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Fix route pattern analyzer false positive with catch-all parameter #55129
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Spurious `XFC0040` errors. #21848
  • [Testing] Finish tests for "Fix crash closing Popup with WebView" #21846
    .NET 8 SR5
  • Enable CSS for VerticalStackLayout and HorizontalStackLayout #21843
  • MAUI .NET 8.0 built with Full AOT Compilation reports a lot of `Mono : AOT NOT FOUND` #21842
  • Focus and blur event get triggered unnecessarily #21841
    Backlog
  • Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #21837
    Backlog
  • Debug build works for android maui8 but release doesnt compile because file is being used by another process #21836
  • [Android] MissingMethodException when trying to get Handler for Maui View #21835
  • [XC] Infer x:DataType from BindingContext or BindingExtension.Source #21834
    Backlog
  • I think you mean that the ellipses inside the `if`s stand for the code you want executed _only_ on change? Then that implementation would make sense. #21832
  • [.Net 8] Bindable Properties Initialization with default new() #21831
  • [Android] SemanticProperties.HeadingLevel not working in ListView #21830
    Backlog
  • Maui Application not launching #21829
  • Flyout Button Disappears #21828
    Backlog
  • ToolTipProperties.Text does not update when used in DataTemplate #21827

Closed

  • ScrollView does not work inside VerticalStackLayout #21822

  • XML Serializer does not work correctly in "net8.0-ios" release mode #21803
  • Magic error #21810

  • Label FormattedString Span on Windows Bleeds Color Between Span Tag Text #21789

    Backlog
  • I think you mean that the ellipses inside the `if`s stand for the code you want executed _only_ on change? Then that implementation would make sense. #21833
  • [X] Avoid calling ResourceDictionary.SetAndLoadSource from code generated by XamlC #19648
  • [X] Compile bindings with explicit source #20266

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Overloaded HasDbFunction throws NullReferenceException in ConcreteColumnExpression constructor #33542
  • Precompiled queries: support value converters #33541
    9.0.0
  • Union/Concat returning more than one entity with owned types generates incorrect joins #33539
  • Projection loads unneeded properties #33538

Closed

  • Inaccurate query warning about distinct operator after ordering with CROSS APPLY OPENJSON #33477
  • Set the ordering as the identifier when translating VALUES #33436
    9.0.0-preview4
  • dotnet ef scaffold with MySql.EntityFramworkCore provider doesn't generate .HasDefaultValue(0) #33506

PullRequests

Merged

  • Various fixes for issues in efcore-in-VMR build #33540
  • Small fix to IInjectableService and lazy loading that removes constants of ParameterBindingInfo objects #33534

Updated

  • Precompiled query inner loop source generator #33350
  • Use [CallerArgumentExpression] for parameterName argument in Check methods #33524
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • Support hierarchical partition keys in Cosmos provider #33536
    breaking-change
